metadata.name: System Network Discovery - macOS
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local network configuration

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/arp')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ifconfig')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netstat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/networksetup')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/socketfilterfw')) OR lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/defaults') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/library/preferences/com.apple.alf')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('read'))) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/wifivelocityd')))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local network configuration

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1016/T1016.md
